Belgium: Edict regulating the organization of markets throughout the Habsburg Netherlands.
Brazil: The city of Salvador, Brazil's first capital, is founded by Tomé de Sousa.
Burma: Burmese and Siamese commands agree to a truce
China: Portuguese trade ships first stopped at Shangchuan Island.
Colombia: Emperor Carlos V, created the Royal Audiencia of Santa Fe, subdivided into districts including the "New Kingdom Provinces": Santa Marta, Río de San Juan, Popayán, bordering with Quito, Guayana o Dorado and Cartagena de Indias. Pamplona was founded.
England: Prayer Book Rebellion: A rebellion occurred in the southwest.
